1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

**[REQUIRED] Expected behavior**  
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

General information about host platform + SDK

- OS: [e.g. iOS 14, Ubuntu 18.04, etc]
- Browser [e.g. firefox 105.0.1 (64-bit), etc]
